title: A Pony Promise
description: Nine-year-old Tiffany loves to go to the horse farm to talk to Windy and some of the other pinto ponies. She's thrilled when one of the horses gives birth to a little brown -and-white pony. But there's a problem. The mother horse isn't taking care of her new baby and her owner is worried.
author: Lois K. Szymanski
